nodes.text: The GAT-12m "Skipray" was part of the GAT Blastboat series produced by Sienar Fleet Systems.
The GAT-12m "Skipray" was a sub-model of the twenty-five meter long GAT-12 Skipray Blastboat. The GAT-12m had faster realspace and hyperdrive engines.
The GAT-12m was used by Imperial forces as interceptor or courier, given its speed.
